Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue trains bypassing UIC Halsted
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running, but not stopping at UIC Halsted due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running, but not stopping at UIC Halsted due to police activity.

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Headline: Blue Line Service Delayed at UIC/Halsted
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are standing at UIC/Halsted due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are standing at UIC/Halsted due to police activity.

Shuttle Buses have been requested from LaSalle to Racine to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

This may include:
#7 Harrison
#126 Jackson
#8 Halsted

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
